name: Dark Domination (WIP)
description:
Meet Darky, the devilish dark blob that wants to conquer everything.

NOTE: If moving doesn't work (I absolutely don't know why) here's the link to the original game page: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/291026091/

Help him by making dark surfaces so he can progress

Move with arrow keys and select things by clicking them

This is a WIP, as I ran out of time.

This is a Puzzle Platformer

Made with Scratch 3.0.
